user.title: Configure SPRSUN Heat Pump
user.description:
Configure connection to your SPRSUN heat pump via Modbus TCP.

**Important:** Make sure your Elfin W11 gateway timeout is set to at least {elfin_timeout} seconds.

Recommended scan interval: {recommended_scan} seconds.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Modbus device. Please check the host, port, and device address.

init.title: SPRSUN Heat Pump Options
init.description: Adjust scan interval (currently {current_interval}s). Make sure Elfin W11 timeout is at least {elfin_timeout} seconds. Changes will apply after reload.
